titles.title: Commending Tincher Preparatory School in Long Beach, California, for the school's innovative efforts to fight childhood obesity, including by designating one day each week as "Healthy Snack Day".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. Commends Tincher Preparatory School in Long Beach, California, for its innovative efforts to fight childhood obesity, which include designating one Healthy Snack Day each week.
